parts.text:
You are a professional Instagram content creator for @hudabeauty. You have been provided with SPECIFIC, REAL DATA about this account including actual post content, engagement metrics, and performance statistics.

YOUR TASK: Create a high-quality Instagram post about "create a religious inspired post for my products for customers in the middle east " using ONLY the provided real data below.

===== REAL ACCOUNT DATA FOR @hudabeauty =====
Profile Analysis Data for hudabeauty on instagram: Account Information: Profile: HUDA BEAUTY Username: @hudabeauty Platform: instagram Bio: BEAUTY IS SELF MADE ðŸ©· By Makeup Artist & Blogger @huda Products tested on Huda, NOT animals Tune into @hudahotline Followers: 56,948,674 Following: 1,645 Posts: 3,068 Verified: Yes Business Account: Yes Category: None,Blogger Website: https://hudabeauty.com/default/lips/jelly-stained-lips Recent Posts and Engagement: Post 1: "Dropping our second ever music video: MADE TO KISS Feat. Hoodie " Engagement: 46,126 likes, 1,265 comments, Total: 47,391 Post 2: "To celebrate the launch of our NEW Lip Contour Stain + FAUX FILLER Jelly Oils today... Iâ€™m dropping my signature lip combo: ðŸ§¸Soft Nude + ðŸ¤Ž Rich Brown + Jelly Oil in Juicy Peach." Engagement: 9,140 likes, 450 comments, Total: 9,590 Post 3: "The new love , THE LIP CONTOUR STAIN + JELLY OIL " Engagement: 157,528 likes, 1,357 comments, Total: 158,885 Post 4: "Do you prefer matte or glossy lips?! ðŸ«¦" Engagement: 10,572 likes, 241 comments, Total: 10,813 Most Engaging Post: "The new love , THE LIP CONTOUR STAIN + JELLY OIL " Performance: 157,528 likes, 1,357 comments Total Engagement: 158,885 Analysis based on 8 relevant data points from the hudabeauty account.
===== END OF REAL DATA =====

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. You MUST base the post content on the actual data provided above
2. Reference successful post patterns from the "Recent Posts and Engagement" section
3. Use hashtags that have performed well based on the data
4. Match the tone and style shown in the actual post content
5. Create content that aligns with proven engagement patterns
6. DO NOT use generic templates - use insights from the real data

RESPOND WITH EXACTLY THIS FORMAT (no additional text):

Caption:
[Write an engaging Instagram caption under 2200 characters that matches the style and themes from the real data above. Make it visually appealing and Instagram-friendly]

Hashtags:
[List 5-10 hashtags based on successful hashtags from the data above]

Call to Action:
[Create a call-to-action that matches engagement patterns from the real data]

Visual Description for Image:
[Write a detailed description for an image that aligns with the visual style and themes shown in the successful posts from the data above. Minimum 100 words with specific details about composition, colors, mood, and style that matches proven performance patterns.]

IMPORTANT: Use EXACTLY the section headers shown above. Base everything on the real account data provided above.
